resources.string: SELECT QUANTITY OF ETHERNET PORTS IN YOUR ROUTER

Please, make sure that you have connected the router with default settings. Configuration will be possible with WiFi only. When the app closes automatically, reconnect to WiFi with the password \"itremedy\", open the app again, in the bottom field enter the password \"itremedy.online\" and press CONNECT.

ImProvider enables you to control MikroTik routers through controlling router users' speed limits.
 The users won't be able to connect each other.
 
 How to use:
 
 1. If you are using a Mikrotik router save its configuration with Winbox and reset it.
 2. Turn on the router.
 3. Plug the internet cable into the first port.
 4. Connect your phone or tablet with ImProvider to WiFi network 	"MikroTik-*****".
 
 *If your router creates two networks, do not use 	"MikroTik-****A"	 due to WiFi security.
 
 We are not responsible for any harm done by ImProvider.
 To delete the app settings on your router reset it.
 Pressing CONTINUE you agree that you've read all that was written above.
Some fields are empty or password is not empty.
Check your connection, input data or router settings. An error occurred:
For unlimited speed enter 999\nTo turn the internet off enter 0
For the new router setup press SETUP NEW ROUTER.\nTo connect already configured router enter the password \"itremedy.online\" and press CONNECT
